• Prerender demo
  • Prefetch demo

Speculative Navigation

Experimental

Google's Speculation Navigation Rules API

"Prefetching or even prerendering certain URL's for a (almost) instant page loading experience."

Imporant!

Make sure you (temporarily) turn off any content blocking tools like uBlock Origin or AdBlocker like web browser extensions. Otherwise the prefetching will not work.

Web browser support?

Is the Speculation Rules API supported in your web browser?

As of this writing (January, 2026) the speculative navigation only works in the following web browser(s):

Works in (desktop & mobile):

  • Chrome
  • Edge
  • Opera (& Opera Air)
  • Chrome Android
  • Opera Android
  • Vivaldi
  • Samsung Internet (browser)
  • WebView Android

Doesn't work in (desktop & mobile):

  • Firefox
  • Firefox Android
  • Safari (MacOS, iPadOS, iOS & iOS WebView)
  • Brave
Also check curren status at Can I Use: speculationrules

My simplified demo is inspired by this YouTube video.
